entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High 11.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 20 in the afternoon. High 11. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
